evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless algorithms that process health data.
Intelligent Medical Objects supports HL7 FHIR standards for data interoperability.
Uses EDI X12 transaction sets to comply with HIPAA regulations in data transactions.
The company employs Amazon S3 for secure storage of sensitive health information.
Integration with EHR systems through established a REST API framework.

icp.icp_reason: Uses EDI X12 for healthcare data exchange; aligns with API-first approach.
matched_use_cases: Data exchange between payers and providers
